message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IM, cs.OH, cs.MM, cs.GR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision): The paper describes a new hyperspectral imaging device that captures RGB images of the scene along with hyperspectral data. This involves image processing and computer vision techniques. 
2. cs.IM (Image and Video Processing): The paper proposes a new imaging device that captures hyperspectral data using a digital micromirror device (DMD) and a CMOS image sensor. This involves image processing techniques. 
3. cs.OH (Other Computer Science): The paper proposes a new imaging device that has no macro moving part and is cost-effective, fast, and robust. This involves other computer science techniques. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper describes a new imaging device that captures RGB images of the scene along with hyperspectral data. This involves multimedia techniques. 
5. cs.GR (Graphics): The paper proposes a new imaging device that uses a diffraction grating to capture hyperspectral data. This involves graphics techniques.
